DOC.criteria: Bestcorrected visual acuity le 20/40 Central subfield macular thickness ( CSMT ) 300 μm great spectraldomain optical coherence tomography Patients recurrent BRVO History previous treatment BRVO include vitreoretinal surgery , intravitreal injection , subtenon injection laser photocoagulation Patients diabetes dyslipidemia IOP ≥ 22mmHg , treatment glaucoma , family history glaucoma , optic neuropathy High myopia ( < 6 Diopters ) , high hyperopia ( > 6 Diopters ) history refractive surgery Coexisting retinal disease BRVO Corneal diseases include ulcer , keratoconus history corneal laceration Cataract medium opacity result visual impairment poor fundus image
